body.raw:
{
  "@id": "csv_dataset_ES521006_2015",
  "@type": "dcat:Dataset",
  "dct:title": "Datos de análisis anual de índices para la cuadrícula del Parque Natural de las lagunas de La Mata y Torrevieja (2015)",
  "dct:description": "Archivo con datos agregados anuales de varios índices espectrales (NDVI, NDWI, MNDWI, etc.) calculados para cada celda de la cuadrícula del Parque Natural de las Lagunas de La Mata y Torrevieja. Incluye un registro por celda y año con los valores resultantes del análisis.",
  "dcat:keyword": ["WETLANDS", "TORREVIEJA", "LA MATA", "GRID", "CEDEX", "NDWI", "MNDWI"],
  "contenttype": "text/csv",
  "dct:type": "Dataset",
  "dct:issued": "2025-12-31T00:00:00+01:00",
  "dct:modified": "2025-12-31T00:00:00+01:00",
  "dct:accrualPeriodicity": "annual",
  "dcat:temporalResolution": "P1D",
  "dct:temporal": {
    "dcat:startDate": "2015-01-01T00:00:00+01:00",
    "dcat:endDate": "2015-12-31T23:59:59+01:00"
  },
  "dcat:spatialResolutionInMeters": 500.0,
  "dct:spatial": "POLYGON ((-0.769833 38.067287, -0.635423 38.067287, -0.635423 37.952159, -0.769833 37.952159, -0.769833 38.067287))",
  "dct:accessRights": "https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/",
  "dcat:distribution": [
    {
      "@type": "dcat:Distribution",
      "dct:format": {
        "@id": "HttpData"
      },
      "dcat:accessURL": "https://example.org/data/analisis_indices_torrevieja_2015.csv",
      "proxyPath": "false",
      "dcat:byteSize": 2761618,
      "cbm:hasDataDictionary": {
        "@type": "cbm:DataDictionary",
        "cbm:hasField": [
          {
            "@type": "cbm:Field",
            "schema:name": "aoi_id",
            "dct:title": "Identificador del área de interés",
            "cbm:datatype": "string",
            "dct:description": "Identificador único del área de interés (laguna).",
            "cbm:sampleValue": "ES521006"
          },
          {
            "@type": "cbm:Field",
            "schema:name": "cell_id",
            "dct:title": "Identificador de celda",
            "cbm:datatype": "string",
            "dct:description": "Identificador único de la celda dentro de la cuadrícula.",
            "cbm:sampleValue": "10"
          },
          {
            "@type": "cbm:Field",
            "schema:name": "timestamp",
            "dct:title": "Fecha y hora",
            "cbm:datatype": "dateTime",
            "dct:description": "Fecha y hora de la imagen o dato analizado.",
            "cbm:sampleValue": "2015-07-06T10:50:16Z"
          },
          {
            "@type": "cbm:Field",
            "schema:name": "ndvi",
            "dct:title": "Índice NDVI",
            "cbm:datatype": "float",
            "dct:description": "Índice de vegetación normalizada.",
            "cbm:sampleValue": "0,12305422"
          },
          {
            "@type": "cbm:Field",
            "schema:name": "ndwi",
            "dct:title": "Índice NDWI",
            "cbm:datatype": "float",
            "dct:description": "Índice de agua normalizada.",
            "cbm:sampleValue": "-0,19679184"
          },
          {
            "@type": "cbm:Field",
            "schema:name": "mndwi",
            "dct:title": "Índice MNDWI",
            "cbm:datatype": "float",
            "dct:description": "Índice modificado de agua.",
            "cbm:sampleValue": "-0,19679184"
          },
          {
            "@type": "cbm:Field",
            "schema:name": "cedex",
            "dct:title": "Índice CEDEX",
            "cbm:datatype": "float",
            "dct:description": "Índice específico CEDEX para análisis ambiental.",
            "cbm:sampleValue": "-0,0859602"
          },
          {
            "@type": "cbm:Field",
            "schema:name": "ndsi",
            "dct:title": "Índice NDSI",
            "cbm:datatype": "float",
            "dct:description": "Índice de diferencia normalizada de la nieve.",
            "cbm:sampleValue": "-0,2685381"
          },
          {
            "@type": "cbm:Field",
            "schema:name": "ratio_swir_nir",
            "dct:title": "Ratio SWIR/NIR",
            "cbm:datatype": "float",
            "dct:description": "Relación entre bandas SWIR y NIR.",
            "cbm:sampleValue": "1,16801"
          },
          {
            "@type": "cbm:Field",
            "schema:name": "ndmi",
            "dct:title": "Índice NDMI",
            "cbm:datatype": "float",
            "dct:description": "Índice de humedad del dosel normalizado.",
            "cbm:sampleValue": "-0,0759602"
          },
          {
            "@type": "cbm:Field",
            "schema:name": "aweish",
            "dct:title": "Índice AWEIsh",
            "cbm:datatype": "float",
            "dct:description": "Índice mejorado de agua para humedales (AWEIsh).",
            "cbm:sampleValue": "-0,26639273"
          },
          {
            "@type": "cbm:Field",
            "schema:name": "cigreen",
            "dct:title": "Índice CIGreen",
            "cbm:datatype": "float",
            "dct:description": "Índice de vegetación con banda verde.",
            "cbm:sampleValue": "0,49938032"
          },
          {
            "@type": "cbm:Field",
            "schema:name": "ndre",
            "dct:title": "Índice NDRE",
            "cbm:datatype": "float",
            "dct:description": "Índice de diferencia normalizada en banda roja y NIR.",
            "cbm:sampleValue": "0,0635949"
          },
          {
            "@type": "cbm:Field",
            "schema:name": "ndti",
            "dct:title": "Índice NDTI",
            "cbm:datatype": "float",
            "dct:description": "Índice de diferencia normalizada de la textura.",
            "cbm:sampleValue": "0,07565519"
          },
          {
            "@type": "cbm:Field",
            "schema:name": "salinity_index",
            "dct:title": "Índice de salinidad",
            "cbm:datatype": "float",
            "dct:description": "Indicador relacionado con la salinidad del agua o suelo.",
            "cbm:sampleValue": "0,0759602"
          },
          {
            "@type": "cbm:Field",
            "schema:name": "ndci",
            "dct:title": "Índice NDCI",
            "cbm:datatype": "float",
            "dct:description": "Índice de diferencia normalizada de clorofila.",
            "cbm:sampleValue": "0,06010487"
          },
          {
            "@type": "cbm:Field",
            "schema:name": "ci_re",
            "dct:title": "Índice CI_RE",
            "cbm:datatype": "float",
            "dct:description": "Índice de vegetación basado en reflectancia roja.",
            "cbm:sampleValue": "0,13885115"
          },
          {
            "@type": "cbm:Field",
            "schema:name": "Latitude",
            "dct:title": "Latitud",
            "cbm:datatype": "float",
            "dct:description": "Coordenada geográfica de latitud en grados decimales.",
            "cbm:sampleValue": "37,95690968"
          },
          {
            "@type": "cbm:Field",
            "schema:name": "Longitude",
            "dct:title": "Longitud",
            "cbm:datatype": "float",
            "dct:description": "Coordenada geográfica de longitud en grados decimales.",
            "cbm:sampleValue": "-0,76692115"
          },
          {
            "@type": "cbm:Field",
            "schema:name": "epsg",
            "dct:title": "EPSG",
            "cbm:datatype": "integer",
            "dct:description": "Código EPSG del sistema de referencia espacial.",
            "cbm:sampleValue": "4326"
          },
          {
            "@type": "cbm:Field",
            "schema:name": "aoi_name",
            "dct:title": "Nombre del área de interés",
            "cbm:datatype": "string",
            "dct:description": "Nombre común del área de interés (laguna).",
            "cbm:sampleValue": "parque natural de las lagunas de la mata y torrevieja"
          },
          {
            "@type": "cbm:Field",
            "schema:name": "folder",
            "dct:title": "Carpeta de origen",
            "cbm:datatype": "string",
            "dct:description": "Nombre de la imagen de la que provienen los datos.",
            "cbm:sampleValue": "S2A_MSIL2A_20150706T105016_N0500_R051_T30SXH_20231010T143709"
          }
        ]
      }
    }
  ],
  "@context": {
    "dcat": "http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#",
    "dct": "http://purl.org/dc/terms/",
    "cbm": "https://w3id.org/cbm/v0.0.1/ns/",
    "schema": "https://schema.org/",
    "@vocab": "https://w3id.org/edc/v0.0.1/ns/"
  }
}

{
  "@id": "geojson_dataset_ES521006",
  "@type": "dcat:Dataset",
  "dct:title": "Cuadrícula base para el Parque Natural de las lagunas de La Mata y Torrevieja en formato GeoJSON",
  "dct:description": "Es una cuadrícula regular de 500 m por 500 m que cubre el espacio de los dos humedales que se encuentran en Torrevieja. Esta se usa para el cálculo de los diferentes índices en cada celda.",
  "dcat:keyword": ["WETLANDS", "TORREVIEJA", "LA MATA", "GRID", "GEOJSON"],
  "contenttype": "application/geo+json",
  "dct:issued": "2025-12-31T00:00:00+01:00",
  "dct:modified": "2025-12-31T00:00:00+01:00",
  "dcat:spatialResolutionInMeters": 500.0,
  "dct:spatial": "POLYGON ((-0.769833 38.067287, -0.635423 38.067287, -0.635423 37.952159, -0.769833 37.952159, -0.769833 38.067287))",
  "dct:type": "Dataset",
  "dct:accessRights": "https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/",
  "dcat:distribution": [
    {
      "@type": "dcat:Distribution",
      "dct:format": {
        "@id": "HttpData"
      },
      "dcat:accessURL": "https://example.org/data/cuadricula_base_torrevieja.geojson",
      "proxyPath": "false",
      "dcat:byteSize": 235562,
      "cbm:hasDataDictionary": {
        "@type": "cbm:DataDictionary",
        "cbm:hasField": [
            {
                "@type": "cbm:Field",
                "schema:name": "FID",
                "dct:title": "Feature ID",
                "dct:description": "Identificador interno de la entidad.",
                "cbm:datatype": "integer",
                "cbm:sampleValue": "1"
            },
            {
                "@type": "cbm:Field",
                "schema:name": "Id",
                "dct:title": "Identificador único",
                "dct:description": "Identificador único para cada celda de la cuadrícula.",
                "cbm:datatype": "string",
                "cbm:sampleValue": "10"
            },
            {
                "@type": "cbm:Field",
                "schema:name": "Longitude",
                "dct:title": "Longitud",
                "dct:description": "Coordenada de longitud de la celda.",
                "cbm:datatype": "decimal",
                "cbm:sampleValue": "-0,76692115"
            },
            {
                "@type": "cbm:Field",
                "schema:name": "Latitude",
                "dct:title": "Latitud",
                "dct:description": "Coordenada de latitud de la celda.",
                "cbm:datatype": "decimal",
                "cbm:sampleValue": "37,95690968"
            }
        ]
      }
    }
   ],
  "@context": {
    "dcat": "http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#",
    "dct": "http://purl.org/dc/terms/",
    "cbm": "https://w3id.org/cbm/v0.0.1/ns/",
    "schema": "https://schema.org/",
    "@vocab": "https://w3id.org/edc/v0.0.1/ns/"
  }
}

{
  "@id": "png_dataset_ES521006",
  "@type": "dcat:Dataset",
  "dct:title": "Imagen PNG con cuadrícula pintada para el Parque Natural de las lagunas de La Mata y Torrevieja",
  "dct:description": "Imagen PNG que muestra las dos lagunas completas con la cuadrícula de 500 m pintada encima. Diseñada para facilitar la interpretación visual a personal sin formación técnica.",
  "dcat:keyword": ["WETLANDS", "TORREVIEJA", "LA MATA", "GRID", "IMAGE", "PNG"],
  "contenttype": "image/png",
  "dct:issued": "2025-12-31T00:00:00+01:00",
  "dct:modified": "2025-12-31T00:00:00+01:00",
  "dcat:spatialResolutionInMeters": 500.0,
  "dct:spatial": "POLYGON ((-0.769833 38.067287, -0.635423 38.067287, -0.635423 37.952159, -0.769833 37.952159, -0.769833 38.067287))",
  "dct:type": "Dataset",
  "dcat:distribution": [
    {
      "@type": "dcat:Distribution",
      "dct:format": {
        "@id": "HttpData"
      },
      "dcat:accessURL": "https://example.org/data/imagen_laguna_cuadricula.png",
      "proxyPath": "false",
      "dcat:byteSize": 180996
    }
  ],
  "dct:accessRights": "https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/",
  "@context": {
    "dcat": "http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#",
    "dct": "http://purl.org/dc/terms/",
    "cbm": "https://w3id.org/cbm/v0.0.1/ns/",
    "schema": "https://schema.org/",
    "@vocab": "https://w3id.org/edc/v0.0.1/ns/"
  }
}

{
	"@id": "airQualityTorrent21",
	"@type": "dcat:Dataset",
	"dct:title": "Air quality in Torrent for 2021",
	"dct:description": "Tabular data containing a list of the daily measurements of the Torrent sensor in 2021",
    "dcat:keyword": ["POLLUTION", "AIR"],
	"contenttype": "text/csv",
    "dct:type": "Dataset",
    "dct:issued": "2022-01-22T13:04:33+00:00",
    "dct:modified": "2022-01-25T23:14:55+00:00",
    "dct:accrualPeriodicity": "annual",
    "dcat:temporalResolution": "P1D",
    "dct:temporal": {
        "dcat:startDate": "2021-01-01T00:00:00+00:00", 
        "dcat:endDate":   "2021-12-01T00:00:00+00:00"
    },
    "dcat:spatialResolutionInMeters": 69000.0,
    "dct:spatial": "POLYGON (( -0.4381504467680264 39.4105711824846 , -0.4568295983091736 39.44940414433466 , -0.6171900219935075 39.4442153805213 , -0.5905964013590401 39.39186506960127 , -0.5055720209872985 39.3881264008169 , -0.4381504467680264 39.41057118248469 ))",
    "dct:accessRights": "https://opendatacommons.org/licenses/odbl/1.0/",
    "cbm:hasSample": ["airQualityTorrentSample"],
    "dcat:inSeries": "torrentAirQualitySeries",
	"dcat:distribution": [
            {
                "@type": "dcat:Distribution",
                "dct:format": {
                    "@id": "HttpData"
                },
                "dcat:accessURL": "http://datosabiertos.torrent.es/dataset/b6623499-2adc-4760-8392-784413d8fb41/resource/0146797f-a81c-452e-9129-8f8a11683656/download/ODMECalidadDelAirePorDias2021.csv",
                "proxyPath": "true",
                "authKey": "x-api-key",
                "authCode": "slq24sGHDw7c",
                "dcat:byteSize": 11005,
                "cbm:hasDataDictionary": {
                    "@type": "cbm:DataDictionary",
                    "cbm:hasField": [
                         {
                            "@type": "cbm:Field",
                            "schema:name": "ANY",
                            "dct:title": "Year",
                            "cbm:datatype": "integer",
                            "dct:description": "Year of the data accrual",
                            "cbm:sampleValue": "2021"
                        },
                        {
                            "@type": "cbm:Field",
                            "schema:name": "FECHA",
                            "dct:title": "Date",
                            "cbm:datatype": "date",
                            "dct:description": "Date of the data accrual",
                            "cbm:sampleValue": "1/1/2021"
                        },
                        {
                            "@type": "cbm:Field",
                            "schema:name": "O3",
                            "dct:title": "Ozone",
                            "cbm:datatype": "integer",

                        }
                    ]
                }
            }
        ],

}

item.name: List Provider Contract Negotiations from Agreement
